objectId.description: The ID to which the phenotype ontology term(s) is applied. For this submission, these will be genes and single affected gene alleles.

items.description: for calculated submissions, this field represents the id of the genetic objects (allele or affectedGenomicModel) that this annotation is based on.

phenotypeTermIdentifiers.description: For most MODs, this will be a single term identifying the phenotype annotation.  For ZFIN, this will be a list, representing a post-composed phenotype annotation.

phenotypeStatement.description: use to provide a human-readable text display for the combination of 1->many ontology terms coded in the phenotypeTermIdentifiers collection.

evidence.description: one publication for which the annotation was made

dateAssigned.description: Date this entity was assigned in it's primary data source.

items.description: all the experimental conditions that participate with the phenotype annotation as defined by the conditionRelationType
